entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the morning. Snow mixed with rain in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
